# displayBox

**Instance Property**

The current style of display box.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var displayBox: PDFDisplayBox { get set }
```

## Discussion

The available values for display boxes are defined in the Constants section in the [doc://com.apple.pdfkit/documentation/PDFKit/PDFPage] class.
title: displayBox
